titles.title: Original Prince Hall Commemorative Stamp Act
Original Prince Hall Commemorative Stamp Act
To provide for the issuance of a Prince Hall Commemorative Stamp.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
